mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${prefix}WF_OPERATE_LOG ( ID, CLASS_NAME, METHOD_NAME, METHOD_ALIAS, RESULT, CALL_TIME, USE_TIME, APP_ID, TENANT_ID, ENGINE_NAME, USER_ID, IP ) values ( #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodAlias, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useTime ,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO ${prefix}WF_OPERATE_LOGDATA ( "LOG_ID", "ARGS_VALUE", "RETURN_VALUE", "EXCEPTION" ) values ( #{logId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{argsValue, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{returnValue, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{exception, jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.select: select ID, CLASS_NAME, METHOD_NAME, METHOD_ALIAS, RESULT, CALL_TIME, USE_TIME, APP_ID, TENANT_ID, ENGINE_NAME, USER_ID, IP from ${prefix}WF_OPERATE_LOG where id = #{id}

select ID, CLASS_NAME, METHOD_NAME, METHOD_ALIAS, RESULT, CALL_TIME, USE_TIME, APP_ID, TENANT_ID, ENGINE_NAME, USER_ID, IP from ${prefix}WF_OPERATE_LOG where 1=1
and id = #{id}
and CLASS_NAME like '%${className}%'
and METHOD_NAME like '%${methodName}%'
and METHOD_ALIAS like '%${methodAlias}%'
and result like '%${result}%'
and CALL_TIME like '%${callTime}%'
and CALL_TIME >= #{callTimeB}
and CALL_TIME <= #{callTimeE}
and USE_TIME like '%${useTime}%'
and APP_ID like '%${appId}%'
and TENANT_ID like '%${tenantId}%'
and ENGINE_NAME like '%${engineName}%'
and USER_ID like '%${userId}%'
and IP like '%${ip}%'
order by CALL_TIME desc

select count(1) from ${prefix}WF_OPERATE_LOG where 1=1
and id = #{id}
and CLASS_NAME like '%${className}%'
and METHOD_NAME like '%${methodName}%'
and METHOD_ALIAS like '%${methodAlias}%'
and result like '%${result}%'
and CALL_TIME like '%${callTime}%'
and CALL_TIME >= #{callTimeB}
and CALL_TIME <= #{callTimeE}
and USE_TIME like '%${useTime}%'
and APP_ID like '%${appId}%'
and TENANT_ID like '%${tenantId}%'
and ENGINE_NAME like '%${engineName}%'
and USER_ID like '%${userId}%'
and IP like '%${ip}%'
